lead_paragraph: CASCIANO--Joseph, 93, passed on Tuesday, January 26, 2016, at his home, surrounded by his loving wife Lee and daughter Donna. Joseph had two daughters, Andrea and Donna. He was the son of Fiore and Grace. He leaves brother Roger, sister-in-law Nina, grandchildren Sarah and Michael, great-granddaughter Adriana, two nieces, a nephew, five grandnephews and many close friends. He proudly served in the Navy in World War II. Graduated Seton Hall University and Masters program at NYU. He was deputy director, division of human resources at New York Board of Education. Wake will be at Blair Mazzarella Funeral Home, Brooklyn, NY on Thursday, January 28th. Mass at St. Rose Lima Church, Brooklyn, NY, Friday at 10am. He will be laid to rest at Ferncliff Cemetery, Hartsdale, NY, Friday at 12:45pm. His caring nature will be terribly missed by all. 1/3
